DOC.brief_title: Visual Performance Prototype Contact Lens Designs
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , participant-masked , randomise , stratify , crossover , bilateral wear , dispense clinical trial participant wear prototype ( test ) commercial ( control ) lens . A minimum overnight washout period require fitting /assessment visit .
DOC.criteria: Able read comprehend English give inform consent demonstrate signing record inform consent . Be least 7 year old , male female . Willing comply wear clinical trial visit schedule direct Investigator . Have ocular health finding consider `` normal '' would prevent participant safely wear contact lens . Correctable least 6/12 ( 20/40 ) good eye contact lens . Be suitable willing wear contact lens . Any preexist ocular irritation , injury condition ( include infection disease ) cornea , conjunctiva eyelid would preclude contact lens fit safe wear contact lens . Any systemic disease adversely affect ocular health e.g . diabetes , Graves ' disease , auto immune diseases ankylose spondylitis , multiple sclerosis , Sj√∂grens syndrome systemic lupus erythematosus . Conditions systemic hypertension arthritis automatically exclude prospective participant . Use need concurrent category S3 ocular medication enrolment and/or clinical trial . Use need systemic medication topical medication may alter normal ocular finding / know affect participant 's ocular health / physiology contact lens performance either adverse beneficial manner enrolment and/or clinical trial . Eye surgery within 12 week immediately prior enrolment trial . NB : Systemic antihistamine allow `` needed basis '' , provide use prophylactically trial least 24 hour clinical trial product use .
